price: 2. La révélation du Livre émane d’Allah, le Tout-Puissant, l’Omniscient,
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
